title: RIP Evelynn Players

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - check back for constant updates now that today's patch out. The PBE currently still down for maintenance. ] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
Removing those buffs is just.... you poor poor fools who play evelynn.

Give you eve players back her movement speed on W, then remove it a day later.

Rest in peace.

Rest in peace Bard too, poor bastard. This is your fate for stealing away dfg.

I am very open to being wrong, and seeing more pbe shit pop up in the next hour. Because if not, well, rip.

Edit: from -2 downvotes to +7 upvotes. MAKE UP YOUR MINDS

replies.body: The buffs tend to come and go. Sometimes they'll get added and removed like 2-3 times.
What? They are reverting the destruction of her W? That's a good thing if I understand correctly.

No... fool

They re added her movement speed gains per spell hit yesterday, on top of the cd reset.

They gave her both.

Now they reverted that, meaning same shitty w.

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vicU514t,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-31T19:18:28.454+0000)
>
> No... fool
> 
> They re added her movement speed gains per spell hit yesterday, on top of the cd reset.
> 
> They gave her both.
> 
> Now they reverted that, meaning same shitty w.

Rip Eve.
We'll see, I guess. But, for the love of God, if something's gotta go, it's the cooldown reduction on spell hits. Her old W was better.
They'll be back. All changes change on the PBE so often.
